an9.13:3.1: sukhavedanīyaṁ → sukhavedaniyaṁ (bj, cck, sya2ed, mr) | dukkhavedanīyaṁ → dukkhavedaniyaṁ (bj, cck, sya2ed, mr)
an9.13:21.1: Yaṁ khvassa, āvuso → yaṁ khvassāvuso (bj); yaṁ khossa āvuso (sya-all); yaṁ kho āvuso (mr) | vussatīti → vussati (sya-all), etthantare pāṭho sya-all, mr potthakesu
